title: Tokyo Tribe 2
synopsis: This is the other side of Tokyo, a Tokyo of a different color. There, various tribes are living. The SARU from Japan's Musashino, WU-RONZE of Bukuro, and HANDS of Shindyuku... Young men living in the city...the public of modern times builds a home out of corruption, these young men of the sordid side of life, a side called "reality," are depicted here!
voices: ['Namikawa, Daisuke', 'Miyake, Kenta', 'Fukkin, Zennosuke', 'Gouri, Daisuke', 'Miki, Shinichiro', 'Toyoguchi, Megumi', 'Tsuji, Shinpachi', 'Ueda, Yuuji', 'Ishii, Kouji', 'Yanada, Kiyoyuki']
